review: It works OK, but it is missing a lot of features and is very clunky.  The UI is extremely ugly/boring and lags often.  Many of the apps are unusable unless you already pay for a subscription, and even if you do pay for it they don't work for certain carriers (I.E. Charter).  My sister has both Roku and Chromecast and they work great.  I would suggest getting either one.  Miracast seems to work OK with it and that is the only thing I used it for.  Ultimately I found my old PS3 to be much easier to use and have lots more apps to choose from.
